body_html:
@peterjc123 @fastlater My torch is version "0.2.1+a4fc05a"，and the platform is（win7+anaconda3,python3.5）.
And I have a problem—— 'Variable' object has no attribute 'creator'. But I can use "grad_fn". Isn't this the latest version?（难道是因为我在Windows下没有安装最新版本？但官方文档用的是creator）
x = Variable(torch.ones(2, 2), requires_grad=True) print(x) print(x.data) print(x.creator)
body:
@peterjc123 @fastlater My torch is version "0.2.1+a4fc05a"，and the platform is（win7+anaconda3,python3.5）.
And I have a problem—— 'Variable' object has no attribute 'creator'. But I can use "grad_fn". Isn't this the latest version?（难道是因为我在Windows下没有安装最新版本？但官方文档用的是creator）
`x = Variable(torch.ones(2, 2), requires_grad=True)
print(x)
print(x.data)
print(x.creator)`
